sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(g \), \(h \), and \(i \) are in continued proportion. Then prove the following.
\[
	\frac{g }{i } = \frac{7 g ^2 - 5 gh + 3 h ^2}{7 h ^2 - 5 hi + 3 i ^2}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
Given that $g $, $h $, and $i $ are in continued proportion. So, we can write}$$
\[
	\frac{g }{h } = \frac{h }{i } = j \textrm{ (assumption)}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow g = \input[s2v1]{}j \textrm{ and } h = \input[s2v2]{}j 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow g = (i\input[s3v1] )j = \input[s3v2]{}j ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{g }{\input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{ij ^2}{i } = j ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now the right hand side can be written as
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{7 \input[s5v1]{} ^2 - 5 gh + \input[s5v2]{} h ^2}{7 h ^2 - 
5 hi + 3 i ^2}
\]
\[
	\frac{7 (ij ^2)^2 - 5 (ij ^2)ij + 3 (ij )^2}{7 (ij )^2 - 5 (ij )i + 3 i ^2}
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{7 i ^2 j ^4 - \input[s6v1]{} i ^2 j ^3 + 3 i ^2 j ^2}{7 i ^2 j ^2 - 5 i ^2 j + \input[s7v2]{} i ^2}
\]
\[
	= \frac{i ^2 j ^2 (7 j ^2 - 5 j + 3 )}{i ^2(7 j ^2 - 5 j + 3 )}
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \input[s7v1]{} ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, from the above two equations, we can write
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "Assuming \frac{g }{h } = \frac{h }{i } = j."}, {"data": ["h", "i"], "text": "$$\text{Taking terms as separate we get $ g = hj $ and $ h = ij $}$$"}, {"data": ["j", "i"], "text": "$$\text{Replacing $h$ with $ij$, we get $g = (ij )j = ij ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["i"], "text": "$$\text{Dividing the above equations by $ i $, we get $\frac{g }{i } = \frac{ij ^2}{i } = j ^2$}$$"}, {"data": ["g", 3], "text": "$$\text{Replaing $g$ with $(ij^2)$, and $h$ with $(ij)$, we get $\frac{7 (ij ^2)^2 - 5 (ij ^2)ij + 3 (ij )^2}{7 (ij )^2 - 5 (ij )i + 3 i ^2}
\$}$$"}, {"data": [5, 3], "text": "$$\text{Upon simplifying the previous equation by opening up the brackets we get $\textrm{RHS } = \frac{i ^2 j ^2 (7 j ^2 - 5 j + 3 )}{i ^2(7 j ^2 - 5 j + 3 )}$}$$"}, {"data": ["j"], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can be written as $j ^2$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
